divs: Sighting DetailsIt was unusually warm outside, so I decided to take a nice cycle across campus looking for squirrels and other wild-life. After going from one end back to the other, methinks I saw a shadow pass over me obstructing the moon light. I looked up and saw a large blimp-egg, teardrop aircraft above me. In the distance I thought I heard the banging of native drums. I thought it was an aircraft from the nearby airforce base, but it wasn't shaped like a regular plane. It was ovular and massive. After seeing the object, I stopped riding. Off in the distance over the soccer fields, I noticed that it stopped moving. Then a light shone down onto the snowy field, and vaporized all the snow. I contacted the airforce base in Chickopee to ask if there was a large object in the area. They responded by saying there was not.
Object Shape: Blimp, Chevron, Egg, Flash, Oval, Teardrop
Summary: I was bicycling across campus, when I noticed the UFO-like object floating over the local sports field.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Amherst
There were no other sightings in Amherst on or around January 13th 2008
